description: Wilfried Knight and Richard Black throw an orgy party and invite the horse-hung duo of Chad Hunt and David Cody as well as newcomers Luke Stamm, Dan Bradford and Clay Price to join in the fun. Things start off with a raunchy suck-fest that centers around Hunt and Codys large cocks, but then things flip to some assembly-line fucking with the bottoms on top.
title: Lost: Orgy
